flawed_nl_solution:
Olaf is 12 years + 3 years = <<12+3=51>>51 years old.
Shannen is 51 years old - 2 years = <<51-2=49>>49 years old.
Jack is 5 years + (2 * 49 years) = <<5+(2*49)=103>>103 years old.
The sum of all of their ages is 12 + 51 + 49 + 103 = <<12+51+49+103=215>>215 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
